content.rendered:
May 24 is Scavenger Hunt Day. A scavenger hunt may be a fun activity for you and your family or friends. You can make your own list or find one on the internet. If you make your own, look around and see what you have that you might put on the list.

There are all sorts of scavenger hunts that you can do: ones that are riddles, color scavenger hunts, outdoor and indoor. The idea is that two or more people look for items on a list. You can look for one at a time, or all of them at once, within a certain time, and bring them to a set location.

Your scavenger hunt can be as simple or as complicated as you like. Below are some ideas that you may use for your list.

  • Find something orange.
  • Find a flower.
  • Find a book with the word “and” in the title.
  • Find something made of aluminum.
  • Find a recipe for apple turnovers on the internet.
  • Find something that rhymes with mat.

Have fun with it. And, if you want to share your ideas, comment below.
